name: Silvestar
short_bio: Silvestar Bistrović is a fearless web engineer, CSS developer, JAMstack enthusiast, and WordPress theme specialist.
bio: Silvestar is a frontend UI developer who enjoys creating pixel-perfect, responsive, and modern websites. Making faster, lighter, and more secure sites using WordPress or Static Page Generators is his speciality. When he is not coding, Silvestar likes to write articles on his blog.
